name: Oculus (SantMax1.0)
description:
THIS IS A HORROR GAME AND MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT

CONTROLS: arrows to move, E to continue

 Well I think that is something obvious, but I had to say it, Oculus is a horror game where you are in a maze where you have to find the exit, currently there are 2 endings, the good one where you manage to escape from the game, and the bad one where everything is repeat in loop until there is the exit. 

Oculus is heavily inspired by Maze War, Baldi's basics in education and learning, and PM 6:06 (Legacy) game for Black and white gamejam: https://itch.io/jam/black-and-white-jam-8
